profile.name: Kees Cook
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at HashiCorp | Database Sharding & Compiler Development Enthusiast
profile.summary: Highly motivated software engineer with a passion for database sharding and compiler development. Proficient in multiple programming languages, including Python, Rust, Shell, C, C++, Java, and SCSS.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at HashiCorp
description: Designed and implemented database sharding solutions for various projects using Rust and Python.
Developed and maintained the acpica compiler, a critical component of the Linux kernel.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software products.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Worked on various open-source projects, including nipa (Python) and boot-utils (Shell).
Developed custom tools for database sharding using Shell scripting.
Contributed to the development of kernel-features (None)

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated various open-source projects, including a Python library for database sharding.
Collaborated with other maintainers to resolve issues and improve the overall quality of the projects.

Database Sharding: Designed and implemented database sharding solutions using Rust and Python.
Developed custom tools for database sharding using Shell scripting.
Compiler Development: Developed and maintained the acpica compiler, a critical component of the Linux kernel.
Contributed to the development of kernel-features (None)
